About

State of Retail bridges research and practice for executives, students, and policy makers. We curate case studies, publish research-backed articles, and offer bite-sized mini classes.

The site is designed to scale—add new content as Markdown files or through the built-in CMS (Decap) integration.

© 2025 State of Retail. All rights reserved.

Built for research, education, and industry impact.
